reviewText: My children and i are huge fans of Scooby and we have never seen any of these movies in Australia, great so buy something that they haven't already seen

I can't believe how fun this was!  I watched Scooby Doo and the gang while I was growing up and now my 2 year old daughter has been introduced to them!  This DVD was perfect for the holiday!  In a sea of cutesy childrens holiday programs, i.e. Winnie-the-Pooh, Mickey Mouse and such, this was refreshing, a bit scary but had my daughter laughing, hiding and glued to the screen!  My daughter asks to watch this over and over!
Excellent quality DVD. My sons love being able to watch Scooby whenever they want.

My daughter loves Scooby. My mom sent her this one for Halloween and my grandma bought her the Christmas one for Christmas and she loves it. She owns a few other volumes but she always goes back to those two. I enjoy watching them with her and they remind me of when I use to love watching Scooby!

The new Scooby Doo adventures are much better than the old ones. They have more comedy and they aren't near as scary for younger kids as the older ones. My five year old son loves the new Scooby Doo way more and he has seen both. This one is a cute DVD - the Christmas one has a great lesson for kids about sharing. The other three adventures are very cool and very imaginative. While in the new adventures some things don't make as much sense as in the old (details like how the monster worked) it's much more fun for the kids!

I grew up watching Scooby and now my 5-year old is doing the same. What a trip it is to sit and watch these with him.  Most are so much more ridiculous than I remember as a kid, but this collection is great! Some unusual episodes with subtle humor (especially the Toy one!). Lots of enjoyment here. However, we got ours at Target for $14.99.
My son loves this video. Very entertaining!

My four year old loves Scooby Doo, so I was very pleased to see that someone bought her this DVD for Christmas. We don't own any Scooby Doo DVDs (we watch random episodes on YouTube), so it didn't matter that these episodes are "repeats" from the season. This is a great cheap gift.
This is a great Scooby-Doo DVD for the holidays. I am a huge Scooby-Doo fan and love watching Scooby cartoons every chance I get. As usual Shaggy and Scooby steal the show. It's great. Love it.

This video completed our set of What's New Scooby Doo (10 DVD Set includes: Space Ape on the Cape, Safari So Good, Halloween Boos and Clues, Merry Scary Holiday, Sports Spooktacular, Monster Matinee, Ghosts on the Go, Zoinks Camera Action, Route Scary Six, Monster Tails).  Like the other movies in the What's New Scooby Doo Series, it has four episodes that are very cute but the stories move quickly which is good for younger kids who get bored easily.  Two thumbs up for this Scooby Doo!  We were very excited since we saw some of the characters we've seen in other episodes (like the Golden Retriever Chrissy and the Secret Six puppies)...

We were a little disappointed by the fact that this got such high reviews and no one bothered to mention that these were repeats.  We thought this would be like some of the other dvd's ie: Mexico, Vampire, Alien invaders, Loch Ness Monster.  Our daughters still enjoyed watching them but kept saying,"Not a new show."  But it still hasn't stopped them from watching it.  I am just disappointed that we were ripped off and bought a dvd with repeat shows....well buyer beware!!!!  Otherwise I would have given it a 5 star as per the kids.

The movie came in great condition and I enjoyed seeing the episodes.  I just love Scooby and the gang.

I bought this Scooby Doo DVD for my 3 year old daughter. She was a little scared for the snowman in the first episode but she quickly warmed up to him. I think she's watched this DVD all the way through at least 60 times since I bought it from Amazon!!

Cute holiday movie

Scooby Doo and the his friends, Fred, Velma, Daphne and Shaggy along for the ride during the holidays and solving four mysteries. The episodes included "A Scooby Doo Christmas;" "A Toy Scary Boo;" "Homeward Bound" and "Recipe for Disaster." They are some bonus features like "Toy Designer's Story: Follow How To Make a Scooby Doo Toy Is Made" from concept through Manufacturers and "Christmas with the Monsters Music Video" and "The Legend of Winter Hollow Challenge."

The four episodes is about 85 minutes in length. Children and adults will enjoy this DVD for the holiday and year round. Scooby Doo and friends are always a joy to watch and enjoy any time of the year.

Can't go wrong with Scooby and the gang! This dvd is just in time for the Christmas season for this four legged rascal to ring up the holiday season with the scary headless snowman on the loose mystery movie! Get this and your hot cocoa and blanket cause you're in for a warm treat!

It's a very funny comical Christmas show I love Scooby Doo anyway but it is something that people should watch with their children and sit down and relax and have popcorn and enjoy it it's a funny cartoon
